title: Best tampons
content: I absolutely love Tampax pearl! These are the only tampons I can and will use ! I have been using this product since I was 13 years old! They are highly absorbent and easy to use! These are also super comfortable which was hard for me to find in other brands in the past! I am very active and these again are so comfortable and I never have leakage with these tampons! I always keep them on hand even for guest!
